item.title: Text Mining Tool
item.description: Overview Text Mining Tool is an interface developed in R using mainly the shiny, tidytext and rtweet packages. The idea of this interface is to allow to you make your own text analysis using live Twitter data. The tool is online on shinyappsâ€™ repository at the address https://adsoncostanzi.shinyapps.io/TextMining/. How does this interface work? The interface is divided into 5 tabs presented in the menu on the left: Home , Search , Word Cloud , Sentiment Analysis and, Topic Modeling .
